name: Gravity Bender
description:
----| Game made for UDC Jam #4, WIP |----

In gravity bender, you control a ball and make your way between puzzles and obstacles to reach your destination while controlling gravity.

WIP - For now you only have the first level.

What is done?
Tutorial map 1 - 80% (only finishing touches now)
Tutorial map 2 - 20% (only idea and layout made outside unity)

Controls:

W A S D - Change gravity;
R - If you got stuck, try pressing it slowly, it will shake your character.

Hints: 
Use power ups and gravity in your favor!
